semantic_description: Ensure RabbitMQ publish/consume operations are properly instrumented with OpenTelemetry so their spans and key attributes appear in Jaeger traces across both cloud and on-prem environments.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: derive from whether the code path is publishing or consuming (e.g., 'publish' or 'consume')

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'routingKey' variable passed to the RabbitMQ client

attributes_to_add.name: app.correlation_token
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'CorrelationToken' extracted from RequestEvents or message headers
